definition: to be fond of/to like/to enjoy/to be happy/to feel pleased/happiness/delight/glad

sentences.english: Will look through the scenery, merchant extremely.
sentences.chinese: 将风景看遍，喜洋洋至极。

sentences.english: Lambs frisk and play, the shepherds pipe all day.
sentences.chinese: 羊羔欢跃喜洋洋，牧童整天笛声扬。

sentences.english: Weny: Look, he is my good friend Happy Yangyang.
sentences.chinese: 是我的好朋友喜洋洋他们。

sentences.english: Radiant celebration etiquette company dedicated to add brilliance to your wedding.
sentences.chinese: 喜洋洋庆典礼仪公司竭诚为您的婚庆增添光彩。

sentences.english: Did you participate in Ocean Park Powerpuff CNY 2003?
sentences.chinese: 你有否参与过海洋公园飞天喜洋洋2003？

sentences.english: Later, a jubilant Michael and Sara walk along the beach.
sentences.chinese: 迟后，喜洋洋的迈可和莎拉沿着海滩漫步。

definition: May you have a prosperous New Year! (New Year's greeting)
lit. lovely flowers, round moon (idiom); fig. everything is wonderful/perfect happiness/conjugal bliss
to be decorated with lanterns and colored banners (idiom)
red neckscarf/by extension, a member of the Young Pioneers
